skills.name: San-Ge Brand
skills.description: [SP: 13][CD: 14s] Attacks nearby enemies to deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG and bleeds enemies hit, inflicting another 20.0% ATK of Physical DMG every 0.5s for 5s.

skills.name: Crimson Foliage
skills.description: Attacks against bleeding enemies gain 10.0% Crit Rate and 15.0% Crit DMG.
